elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Defective delivery".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the statutory warranty period for new goods?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How long does the warranty last for used goods?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Under what circumstances is it possible to exclude the warranty?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is product liability?
elements.correctAnswer: Product liability refers to the manufacturer's liability for damage caused by a defective product.
